body.p: Our mutual friend M Hously Indicted one of our neighborhood Turnpikes and They confessed Jugement for $100 -- We think the part due the courts should be remitted as it is impossible to keep the Roads in repair during Their use by the Federal Wagons we know the whole neighborhood desires the fine remitted and Justice demands it

A few individuals built the road at considerable expense to them, it is surely a neighborhood road and pays nothing to the stock holders. It was indicted with other roads for being out of repair. Under the peculiar circumstances and state of the country I think ^the^ stockholders entitled to the remission
P. S. The style of the prosecution is the Commonwealth & The Stanford & Shelby's meeting house turnpike road

Lincoln Cir Ct
